alert.note: Alert for Siskiyou (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 02 at 8:59PM PDT until August 02 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Medford has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... North Central Siskiyou County in northern California... * Until 1100 PM PDT. * At 859 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the for the McKinney Fire Area. Flash flooding and/or debris flows are ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding and/or debris flows caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding and/or debris flows in and near the burn area. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Areas in and near the McKinney Fire. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Stay clear of the burned area. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
